statements.select: INSERT INTO public.wip_processend( equipmentid, portid, porttype, partname, stepname, durableid, mainqty, operatorid, actioncomment, returncode, returnmsg, updatedate) VALUES ( #equipmentid#, #portid#, #porttype#, #partname#, #stepname#, #durableid#, #mainqty#, #operatorid#, #actioncomment#, #returncode#, #returnmsg#, localtimestamp(0)) RETURNING id;
statements.insert: INSERT INTO public.wip_processend_glass( equipmentid, panelid, lottype, blid, grade, position, actioncomment, abnormalcode, defectcode, parentid, returncode, returnmsg, updatedate) VALUES ( #equipmentid#, #panelid#, #lottype#, #blid#, #grade#, #position#, #actioncomment#, #abnormalcode#, #defectcode#, #parentid#, #returncode#, #returnmsg#, localtimestamp(0));
statements.select:
select * from wip_processend
equipmentid =#equipmentid#
portid =#portid#
durableid like '%' || #durableid# || '%'
id =#id#

select * from wip_processend_glass
equipmentid = #equipmentid#
panelid like '%' || #panelid# || '%'
parentid =#parentid#
id =#id#
order by id
statements.update: UPDATE public.wip_processend SET equipmentid=#equipmentid#, portid=#portid#, porttype=#porttype#, partname=#partname#, stepname=#stepname#, durableid=#durableid#, mainqty=#mainqty#, operatorid=#operatorid#, actioncomment=#actioncomment#, returncode=#returncode#, returnmsg=#returnmsg#, updatedate=localtimestamp(0) WHERE id=#id#;

UPDATE public.wip_processend_glass SET equipmentid=#equipmentid#, panelid=#panelid#, lottype=#lottype#, blid=#blid#, grade=#grade#, position=#position#, actioncomment=#actioncomment#, abnormalcode=#abnormalcode#, defectcode=#defectcode#, parentid=#parentid#, returncode=#returncode#, returnmsg=#returnmsg#, updatedate=localtimestamp(0) WHERE id=#id#;
